query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHECK ,LE002.MANDT AS MANDT ,LE002.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM ,LE002.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 ,LE002.PSPID AS PSPID --,LE002.POST1 AS POST1 ,CASE WHEN VBAK.VIPTP = 'X' THEN '[VIP]'||LE002.POST1 ELSE LE002.POST1 END POST1 ,LE002.ZTEXT AS ZTEXT , CASE WHEN LE002.TPLSTDT1 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT2 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT3 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT4 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT5 = '' THEN LE002.BEZEI ELSE LF1.NAME1 END BEZEI ,LE002.TPLST AS TPLST ,LE002.ERDAT AS ERDAT ,LE002.ERZET AS ERZET ,LE002.DPTEN AS DPTEN ,LE002.UPTEN AS UPTEN ,LE002.AEDAT AS AEDAT ,LE002.AENAM AS AENAM ,LE002.UZEIT AS UZEIT , CASE WHEN LE002.TPLSTDT1 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT2 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT3 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT4 = '' AND LE002.TPLSTDT5 = '' THEN SUBSTR(CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON1 > 0 THEN ',1T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON1 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON2 > 0 THEN ',2.5T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON2 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON3 > 0 THEN ',3.5T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON3 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON4 > 0 THEN ',5T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON4 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON5 > 0 THEN ',8T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON5 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON6 > 0 THEN ',11T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON6 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON7 > 0 THEN ',18T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON7 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON8 > 0 THEN ',25T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON8 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON9 > 0 THEN ',Trailer-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON9 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON10 > 0 THEN ',택배-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON10)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON11 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(20)-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON11)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON12 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(40)-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON12)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON13 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(20)round-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON13)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON15 > 0 THEN ',셔틀-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON15)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON14 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(40)round-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON14)) ELSE '' END,2) ELSE LE002.TPLSTDTZTON1 END ZTON ,LE002.ZLZONE AS ZLZONE ,VALUE(TZONT.VTEXT, '') AS ZLZONE_NM ,LE002.ZTYPE AS ZTYPE ,CASE LE002.ZTYPE WHEN '11' THEN '천안->현장' WHEN '12' THEN '업체->현장' WHEN '13' THEN '업체->천안' WHEN '14' THEN '현장->천안' WHEN '15' THEN '이천->천안' ELSE '' END AS ZTYPE_NM ,LE002.ZCHAN AS ZCHAN ,CASE LE002.ZCHAN WHEN '1' THEN '현장문제' WHEN '2' THEN '폭설,폭우' WHEN '3' THEN '운송사 차량수배 불가' WHEN '4' THEN '골조지연' WHEN '5' THEN '기타' ELSE '' END AS ZCHAN_NM ,LE002.POSID AS POSID ,MAST2.TEMNO AS ZZTEMNO ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN VALUE(( SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MAST1 WHERE MAST1.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND MAST1.POSID = LE002.PSPID FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), '') ELSE MAST2.NAMET END AS ZZTEAMJ ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(( SELECT CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MAST1 WHERE MAST1.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND MAST1.POSID = LE002.PSPID FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), ''))
ELSE SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(PS011.CELLP, '')) END AS CELLP ,MAST2.TEMNO2 AS ZZTEMNO2 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN VALUE(( SELECT NAMET2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MAST1 WHERE MAST1.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND MAST1.POSID = LE002.PSPID FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), '') ELSE MAST2.NAMET2 END AS ZZTEAMJ2 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN VALUE(( SELECT CELLP2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MAST1 WHERE MAST1.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND MAST1.POSID = LE002.PSPID FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), '') ELSE SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(( SELECT CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS PS001 WHERE PS001.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND PS001.LIFNR = MAST2.LIFNR AND PS001.TEMNO = MAST2.TEMNO2 AND PS001.POSIT = 'X' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), '')) END AS CELLP2 ,VALUE(LE002.NAMET, '') AS NAMET ,VALUE(LE002.MOB_NUMBER,'') AS MOB_NUMBER ,VALUE(LE002.TRAID, '') AS TRAID ,SAPHEE.GET_LE_HOGI(LE002.MANDT,LE002.ZKNUM,LE002.ZKNUM2) AS HOGI ,SAPHEE.GET_LE_SPEC(LE002.MANDT,LE002.ZKNUM,LE002.ZKNUM2) AS SPEC ,MAST2.ZSPEC1 ,MAST2.ZSPEC2 ,LE002.ZTRANS AS ZTRANS ,LE002.TABNM AS TABNM ,LE005.NAME1 AS NAME1 -- 운수회사 ,KN.ORT01 ,KN.STRAS ,M12.NAME1 AS SNAME1 --,VALUE((SELECT MAX(ZSTAT1) FROM SAPHEE.ZLET017 AS L7 WHERE L7.MANDT = LE002.MANDT -- AND L7.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM AND L7.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 GROUP BY ZKNUM,ZKNUM2),'') AS ZSTAT1 --,VALUE((SELECT MAX(ZSTAT2) FROM SAPHEE.ZLET017 AS L7 WHERE L7.MANDT = LE002.MANDT -- AND L7.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM AND L7.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 GROUP BY ZKNUM,ZKNUM2),'') AS ZSTAT2 ,VALUE((SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(ZSTAT3) = 'X' THEN '3' WHEN MIN(ZSTAT2) = 'X' THEN '2' WHEN MIN(ZSTAT1) = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END FROM SAPHEE.ZLET017 AS L7 WHERE L7.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND L7.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM AND L7.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 AND L7.ZCANC='' GROUP BY ZKNUM,ZKNUM2),'') AS ZSTAT4 ,VALUE((SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(ZSTAT3) = 'X' THEN '3' WHEN MAX(ZSTAT2) = 'X' THEN '2' WHEN MAX(ZSTAT1) = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END FROM SAPHEE.ZLET017 AS L7 WHERE L7.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND L7.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM AND L7.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 AND L7.ZCANC='' GROUP BY ZKNUM,ZKNUM2),'') AS ZSTAT ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.ERNAM,1,1) = 'M' THEN 'ERP' ELSE U.USERNAME END AS ERNAM ,LF1.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT1 ,LF2.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT2 ,LF3.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT3 ,LF4.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT4 ,LF5.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT5 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY1 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY2 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY3 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY4 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY5 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON1 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON2 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON3 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON4 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON5 ,LF6.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT6 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY6 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON6 ,LF7.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT7 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY7 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON7 --,CASE WHEN LT001.LIFCD = 'A' THEN '로지' -- WHEN LT001.LIFCD = 'B' THEN '신원' -- ELSE '' END AS LIFCD ,case when LE002.LIFNRCO = '3148131696' then '로지' when LE002.LIFNRCO = '1018194310' then '신원' when LE002.LIFNRCO = '3038100062' then '중앙' else '' END as lifcd ,CAR.CARINFO FROM (
SELECT T2.MANDT AS MANDT ,T2.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM ,T2.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 ,MAX(T3.PSPID ) AS PSPID ,MAX(T3.POST1 ) AS POST1 ,MAX(T2.ZTEXT ) AS ZTEXT ,MAX(T2.BEZEI ) AS BEZEI ,MAX(T2.TPLST ) AS TPLST ,MAX(T2.ERDAT ) AS ERDAT ,MAX(T2.ERZET ) AS ERZET ,MAX(T2.DPTEN ) AS DPTEN ,MAX(T2.UPTEN ) AS UPTEN ,MAX(T2.ZTON1 ) AS ZTON1 ,MAX(T2.ZTON2 ) AS ZTON2 ,MAX(T2.ZTON3 ) AS ZTON3 ,MAX(T2.ZTON4 ) AS ZTON4 ,MAX(T2.ZTON5 ) AS ZTON5 ,MAX(T2.ZTON6 ) AS ZTON6 ,MAX(T2.ZTON7 ) AS ZTON7 ,MAX(T2.ZTON8 ) AS ZTON8 ,MAX(T2.ZTON9 ) AS ZTON9 ,MAX(T2.ZTON10) AS ZTON10 ,MAX(T2.ZTON11) AS ZTON11 ,MAX(T2.ZTON12) AS ZTON12 ,MAX(T2.ZTON13) AS ZTON13 ,MAX(T2.ZTON14) AS ZTON14 ,MAX(T2.ZTON15) AS ZTON15 ,MAX(T3.ZLZONE) AS ZLZONE ,MAX(T2.ZTYPE ) AS ZTYPE ,MAX(T2.ZCHAN ) AS ZCHAN ,MAX(T2.ZTRANS) AS ZTRANS ,'2' AS TABNM ,MIN(T4.POSID ) AS POSID ,MAX(T2.LIFNR ) AS LIFNR ,MAX(T2.ZHYUN ) AS ZHYUN ,MAX(T3.KUNNR ) AS KUNNR ,MAX(T2.ERNAM ) AS ERNAM ,MAX(T2.NAMET) AS NAMET ,MAX(T2.MOB_NUMBER) AS MOB_NUMBER ,MAX(T2.TRAID ) AS TRAID ,MIN(T2.AEDAT ) AS AEDAT -- BOX33 처리로 20100422기준으로 MIN 추후 MAX조정 필요 ,MAX(T2.AENAM ) AS AENAM ,MAX(T2.UZEIT ) AS UZEIT ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT1) AS TPLSTDT1 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT2) AS TPLSTDT2 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT3) AS TPLSTDT3 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT4) AS TPLSTDT4 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT5) AS TPLSTDT5 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY1) AS TPLSTDTQTY1 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY2) AS TPLSTDTQTY2 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY3) AS TPLSTDTQTY3 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY4) AS TPLSTDTQTY4 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY5) AS TPLSTDTQTY5 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON1) AS TPLSTDTZTON1 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON2) AS TPLSTDTZTON2 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON3) AS TPLSTDTZTON3 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON4) AS TPLSTDTZTON4 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON5) AS TPLSTDTZTON5 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT6) AS TPLSTDT6 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY6) AS TPLSTDTQTY6 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON6) AS TPLSTDTZTON6 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT7) AS TPLSTDT7 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY7) AS TPLSTDTQTY7 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON7) AS TPLSTDTZTON7 ,MAX(T2.LIFNR) AS LIFNRCO FROM SAPHEE.ZLET002 AS T2 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET003 AS T3 ON T2.MANDT = T3.MANDT AND T2.ZKNUM = T3.ZKNUM AND T2.ZKNUM2 = T3.ZKNUM2 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET004 AS T4 ON T3.MANDT = T4.MANDT AND T3.VBELN = T4.VBELN
WHERE T2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T2.ZKNUM LIKE '_%' AND T2.ERDAT BETWEEN #ERDAT_FM# AND #ERDAT_TO#
AND T2.ZTYPE = #ZTYPE#
AND T3.ZLZONE = #ZLZONE#
AND T2.TPLST = #TPLST#
AND T2.TPLST = #TPLST#
AND T2.TPLST = #TPLST#
AND T2.TPLST NOT IN ('1000','1100')
AND T2.ZCANC <> 'X' GROUP BY T2.MANDT,T2.ZKNUM,T2.ZKNUM2
UNION
SELECT T6.MANDT AS MANDT ,T6.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM ,T6.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 ,MAX(T7.PSPID ) AS PSPID ,MAX(T7.POST1 ) AS POST1 ,MAX(T6.ZTEXT ) AS ZTEXT ,MAX(T6.BEZEI ) AS BEZEI ,'' AS TPLST ,MAX(T6.ERDAT ) AS ERDAT ,MAX(T6.ERZET ) AS ERZET ,MAX(T6.DPTEN ) AS DPTEN ,MAX(T6.UPTEN ) AS UPTEN ,MAX(T6.ZTON1 ) AS ZTON1 ,MAX(T6.ZTON2 ) AS ZTON2 ,MAX(T6.ZTON3 ) AS ZTON3 ,MAX(T6.ZTON4 ) AS ZTON4 ,MAX(T6.ZTON5 ) AS ZTON5 ,MAX(T6.ZTON6 ) AS ZTON6 ,MAX(T6.ZTON7 ) AS ZTON7 ,MAX(T6.ZTON8 ) AS ZTON8 ,MAX(T6.ZTON9 ) AS ZTON9 ,MAX(T6.ZTON10) AS ZTON10 ,MAX(T6.ZTON11) AS ZTON11 ,MAX(T6.ZTON12) AS ZTON12 ,MAX(T6.ZTON13) AS ZTON13 ,MAX(T6.ZTON14) AS ZTON14 ,MAX(T6.ZTON15) AS ZTON15 ,MAX(T7.ZLZONE) AS ZLZONE ,MAX(T6.ZTYPE ) AS ZTYPE ,'' AS ZCHAN ,'' AS ZTRANS -- 배차 ,'' AS TABNM -- 현장직투입 ,MIN(T7.POSID) AS POSID ,MAX(T6.LIFNR) AS LIFNR ,MAX(T6.ZHYUN) AS ZHYUN ,MAX(T7.KUNNR) AS KUNNR ,MAX(T6.ERNAM) AS ERNAM ,MAX(T6.NAMET) AS NAMET ,MAX(T6.MOB_NUMBER) AS MOB_NUMBER ,MAX(T6.TRAID) AS TRAID ,MIN(T6.AEDAT) AS AEDAT ,MAX(T6.AENAM) AS AENAM ,MAX(T6.UZEIT) AS UZEIT ,'' AS TPLSTDT1 ,'' AS TPLSTDT2 ,'' AS TPLSTDT3 ,'' AS TPLSTDT4 ,'' AS TPLSTDT5 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY1 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY2 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY3 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY4 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY5 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON1 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON2 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON3 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON4 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON5 ,'' AS TPLSTDT6 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY6 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON6 ,'' AS TPLSTDT7 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY7 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON7 ,MAX(T6.LIFNR) AS LIFNRCO FROM SAPHEE.ZLET006 AS T6 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET007 AS T7 ON T6.MANDT = T7.MANDT AND T6.ZKNUM = T7.ZKNUM AND T6.ZKNUM2 = T7.ZKNUM2 WHERE T6.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T6.ZKNUM LIKE '_%' AND T6.ERDAT BETWEEN #ERDAT_FM# AND #ERDAT_TO#
AND T6.ZTYPE = #ZTYPE#
AND T6.TPLST2 = #ZLZONE#
AND T6.TPLST = #TPLST#
AND T6.TPLST = #TPLST#
AND T6.TPLST = #TPLST#
AND T6.TPLST NOT IN ('1000','1100')
AND T6.ZCANC <> 'X'
GROUP BY T6.MANDT,T6.ZKNUM,T6.ZKNUM2
) AS LE002
-- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET009 AS LE009 ON LE009.MANDT = LE002.MANDT -- AND LE009.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM -- AND LE009.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 -- AND LE009.PSPID = LE002.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.TZONT AS TZONT ON TZONT.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND TZONT.SPRAS = '3' AND TZONT.LAND1 = 'KR' AND TZONT.ZONE1 = LE002.ZLZONE LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MAST2 ON MAST2.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND MAST2.POSID = COALESCE(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,3,6) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,6) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='V' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,6) ELSE SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,6) END,'') AND MAST2.POSID_1= COALESCE(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,3,9) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,9) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='V' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,9) ELSE SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,9) END,'')
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS PS011 ON PS011.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND PS011.TEMNO = MAST2.TEMNO AND PS011.RETIF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET005 AS LE005 ON LE005.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND LE005.LIFNR = LE002.LIFNR AND LE005.ZHYUN = LE002.ZHYUN
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS KN ON KN.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND KN.KUNNR = LE002.KUNNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M12 ON M12.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND M12.LIFNR = MAST2.LIFNR AND M12.KTOKK LIKE '_%'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS U ON U.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND U.USERNUMB = LE002.ERNAM LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS VBAK ON LE002.MANDT = VBAK.MANDT AND LE002.PSPID = VBAK.ZZPJT_ID left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF1 on LE002.TPLSTDT1 = LF1.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF2 on LE002.TPLSTDT2 = LF2.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF3 on LE002.TPLSTDT3 = LF3.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF4 on LE002.TPLSTDT4 = LF4.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF5 on LE002.TPLSTDT5 = LF5.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF6 on LE002.TPLSTDT6 = LF6.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF7 on LE002.TPLSTDT7 = LF7.LIFNR --LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET001_1 AS LT001 ON LE002.MANDT = LT001.MANDT AND LE002.ZLZONE = LT001.ZONE1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- 톤수, 출발지, 차량번호, 전화번호 SELECT ZKNUM, ZKNUM2, LEFT(LISTAGG('('||ZTON ||'/'|| TPLSTDT || CASE WHEN TRAID = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| TRAID END || CASE WHEN MOB_NUMBER = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| MOB_NUMBER END ||') / '),length(LISTAGG('('||ZTON ||'/'|| TPLSTDT || CASE WHEN TRAID = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| TRAID END || CASE WHEN MOB_NUMBER = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| MOB_NUMBER END ||') / ')) - 2 ) AS CARINFO
FROM ( SELECT A.ZKNUM ,A.ZSEQ ,A.TRAID ,A.MOB_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN A.ZTON = 'A' THEN '1 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'B' THEN '2.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'C' THEN '3.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'D' THEN '5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'E' THEN '8 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'F' THEN '11 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'G' THEN '18 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'H' THEN '25 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'I' THEN 'Trailer' WHEN A.ZTON = 'J' THEN '택배' WHEN A.ZTON = 'K' THEN 'Trail-20' WHEN A.ZTON = 'L' THEN 'Trail-40' WHEN A.ZTON = 'M' THEN 'Trail-20 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'N' THEN 'Trail-40 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'O' THEN '셔틀' ELSE '' END AS ZTON , A.ZKNUM2 , C.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT FROM SAPHEE.ZLET041 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET002 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 C ON A.TPLSTDT = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND A.ZKNUM = '20210107-001' --AND A.ZKNUM2 = '' UNION SELECT A.ZKNUM ,A.ZSEQ ,A.TRAID ,A.MOB_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN A.ZTON = 'A' THEN '1 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'B' THEN '2.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'C' THEN '3.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'D' THEN '5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'E' THEN '8 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'F' THEN '11 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'G' THEN '18 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'H' THEN '25 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'I' THEN 'Trailer' WHEN A.ZTON = 'J' THEN '택배' WHEN A.ZTON = 'K' THEN 'Trail-20' WHEN A.ZTON = 'L' THEN 'Trail-40' WHEN A.ZTON = 'M' THEN 'Trail-20 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'N' THEN 'Trail-40 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'O' THEN '셔틀' ELSE '' END AS ZTON , A.ZKNUM2 , A.TPLSTDT FROM SAPHEE.ZLET041 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET006 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2 WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# -- AND A.ZKNUM = '20210107-001' -- AND A.ZKNUM2 = '' ORDER BY ZSEQ ASC ) GROUP BY ZKNUM, ZKNUM2 ) CAR ON LE002.ZKNUM = CAR.ZKNUM AND LE002.ZKNUM2 = CAR.ZKNUM2
ORDER BY ZKNUM DESC, ZKNUM2, ERDAT, ERZET FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
